WorkItem.Description: I updated Windows 7 last night (not sure if this is related) when I installed Wabbitemu the emulator shows up and but there is a large window overlapping the calculator.  The buttons do not match up with the image on the screen making the emulator unusable.  I attached an image of what it looks like.

Comments.Message: Even I had the same issue... how do i fix it?

I had the same problem.....just type wabbitemu.ini in your computers file search bar and open it.....scroll to the bottom and change the screen_scale to 1 and the skin_scale to 1.000000
it should look like this 
screen_scale=1
skin_scale=1.000000
